summary: The true story of controversial leader of independent Congo, Patrice Lumumba.
cast: Eriq Ebouaney|Alex Descas|Théophile Sowié|Maka Kotto|Dieudonné Kabongo|Pascal N'Zonzi|André Debaar|Cheik Doukouré|Makena Diop|Mariam Kaba|Rudi Delhem|Francis Adam|Olivier Bony|Alain Bouillé|Pavel Dobrovsky|Mata Gabin|Michael Hofland|Edgar Henri Mato|Den Thatcher|Paul Tingay
title: Lumumba
